channel.title: Hyderabad on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in Hyderabad on NewsStreet

item.title: Young writer, once a catering steward, now has his poems taught in universities
item.description: Young writer, once a catering steward, now has his poems taught in universities Ramesh Karthik, who used to work as a steward in catering events to earn some money to publish his books, has been writing on the culture and lifestyle of Banjara communities, adding a dash of fiction.

item.title: Human trafficking: Women from West Bengal, Karnataka account for 70% of victims
item.description: Human trafficking: Women from West Bengal, Karnataka account for 70% of victims The women forced into prostitution by the racket were also found to be from Maharashtra (15%), Delhi (7%) and other States (5%).

item.title: Punjagutta graveyard revamped, more greenery will be added: KTR
item.description: Punjagutta graveyard revamped, more greenery will be added: KTR The graveyard is being developed on lines of Vaikunta Mahaprasthanam in Jubilee Hills

item.title: Woxsen University holds convocation ceremony in Hyderabad
item.description: Woxsen University holds convocation ceremony in Hyderabad Students of Woxsen University were awarded degree certificates on successful completion of two-year full-time MBA

item.title: Hyderabad: IBS crowned overall champions at AAVEG 13
item.description: Hyderabad: IBS crowned overall champions at AAVEG 13 ICFAI Business School (IBS) emerged overall champion after winning top honours in ten event at the three-day sports fest

item.title: Telangana: District Academic Task Force on FLN kept on hold
item.description: Telangana: District Academic Task Force on FLN kept on hold The orders issued constituting the DATF on FLN were kept on hold due to administrative reasons

item.title: Telangana best among other Indian states in organ donation: Harish Rao
item.description: Telangana best among other Indian states in organ donation: Harish Rao State government will use choppers to transport donated organs of the brain dead patients from districts hospitals to teaching hospitals

item.title: TSCHE to hold conclave on employability in Hyderabad on Nov 21
item.description: TSCHE to hold conclave on employability in Hyderabad on Nov 21 State-level conclave on ‘Empowering Education to Augment Employability’ at Taj Deccan here on Monday.

item.title: Telangana: Concern voiced over BJP’s misuse of central agencies
item.description: Telangana: Concern voiced over BJP’s misuse of central agencies Nalgonda: Leaders of different organizations have in a single voice expressed strong concern over the misuse of central agencies including the Enforcement Directorate (ED) and the Central Bureau of Investigation (CBI) by the BJP government to target opposition parties.

item.title: Hyderabad: Water Board to cut supply over non-payment of bills
item.description: Hyderabad: Water Board to cut supply over non-payment of bills HMWS&SB MD Dana Kishore instructed the officials to focus on the collection of dues from commercial and non-free water scheme connections.

item.title: Telangana: Over 8.93 lakh tonnes paddy procured for Vaanakalam season
item.description: Telangana: Over 8.93 lakh tonnes paddy procured for Vaanakalam season The paddy procurement for Vaanakalam (Kharif) season is being undertaken at a brisk pace, with around 8.

item.title: Women Safety Wing of Telangana police invites applications for various posts on contract basis
item.description: Women Safety Wing of Telangana police invites applications for various posts on contract basis Hyderabad: Telangana police Women Safety Wing is inviting applications from eligible candidates for different posts on a contractual basis.

item.title: OU invites applications for admissions to Diploma in Radiological Physics
item.description: OU invites applications for admissions to Diploma in Radiological Physics The course is offered by department of Physics, OU, in collaboration with certain hospitals in Hyderabad

item.title: Daily walking is the secret to lead an active life, says 87-year-old cardiologist
item.description: Daily walking is the secret to lead an active life, says 87-year-old cardiologist Hyderabad: What is the ‘secret sauce’ that drives an 87-year-old cardiologist to lead an active life, treat his patients on a daily basis, and be considered as an experienced physician with best diagnostic skills in town?

item.title: Traffic diversions in view of Bharath Jodo Yatra in Telangana
item.description: Traffic diversions in view of Bharath Jodo Yatra in Telangana The Cyberabad traffic police in view of the 'Bharath Jodo Yatra' have announced certain traffic diversions for four days starting Sunday.

item.title: T-Hub, MEE School announces Cinepreneur Entrepreneurship Certification course
item.description: T-Hub, MEE School announces Cinepreneur Entrepreneurship Certification course Cinepreneur is a Media and Entrepreneurship (M&E) program that imparts module-based learning for media business enthusiasts and aspirants.
